Thank you to the community for the guide
We need to get bbe installed on our Linux System Easy instrucitons for most distros below. Pick what mactehs your distro. Steam deck/ Universal method instructions covered after.
Install bbe on Ubuntu # If you a debian/ubuntu based distro (Linux Mint,Ubuntu,Debian,,PopOS,PikaOS,Zorin)
To install the Binary Block Editor (bbe) on Ubuntu, run:
sudo apt update sudo apt install bbe Install bbe on Arch via yay # If you use a Arch based distro(Arch,CachyOS,EndevourOS, I know you know you’re on Arch) (not Steam Deck see Manual Install method)
sudo pacman -S yay yay -S bbe Install bbe on Fedora via COPR # If you use a fedora based distro (Fedora,Nobara,ect)
Enable the COPR repo:
sudo dnf copr enable adrianl40/bbe sudo dnf install bbe Confirmed BBE is installed # After install confirm with:
bbe --version 1. Manual Install bbe (Steam Deck Guide,works on any distro) # How to install bbe
bbe is a program that is used to edit binary files, it is specifically used to edit the launcher executable in the tutorial.
Download bbe 0.2.2.1 to your downloads folder from https://archive.org/download/archlinux_pkg_bbe bbe-0.2.2-1-x86_64.pkg.tar.xz
2. Extract binary # mkdir -p ~/bbe-temp cd ~/bbe-temp bsdtar -xf ~/Downloads/bbe-0.2.2-1-x86_64.pkg.tar.xz 3. Copy to user path # mkdir -p ~/bin cp usr/bin/bbe ~/bin/ 4. Add ~/bin to your path (if it isn’t already) # nano ~/.bashrc Use down arrow key to go bottom of the file and copy the below text
export PATH="$HOME/bin:$PATH" Press Ctrl + X, then Y to save, and Enter to save the file.
"source ~/.bashrc" 5. Verify BBE is installed # Verify bbe is installed, and ~/bin has been added to your path
bbe --version If you are on CachyOS or another distro that uses zsh or fish as main shell. Just change to a bash shell by typing the below.
bash Wait for bash prompt then
bbe --version 6. Patching the Launcher # Locate where the PGR launcher got installed, it should usually be in ~/.wine/drive_c/Program Files/Punishing Gray Raven/x.y.z.w/ (x.y.z.w is current launcher version)
Open a terminal inside that directory (should be the version directory where the name is a version number) Paste this command in:
mv launcher_main.dll launcher_main.dll.bak bbe -e "s/\x12AllowsTransparency/\x09IsEnabled\x1bA\x00\x03AAAAA/" launcher_main.dll.bak > launcher_main.dll This does not alter the game in any way! It simply disables Transparency inside the launcher to allow the launcher to render.
Run the launcher_main.exe with proton not wine.
YOU WILL NEED TO RE-PATCH THE LAUNCHER EVERYTIME IT UPDATES!! # AS OF 4.0 IT IS REQUIRED YOU USE PROTON-CACHYOS!!!! #
title: Punishing Gray Raven on Linux

We need to get bbe installed on our Linux Desktops System # Steam Deck users would need another video/guide but PGR official server does have a good guide and help section using the Universal Method. # Install bbe on Ubuntu/Debian Distros # Using a debian/ubuntu based distro (Linux Mint,Ubuntu,Debian,,PopOS,PikaOS,Zorin)
To install the Binary Block Editor (bbe) on Ubuntu, run:
sudo apt update sudo apt install bbe Install bbe on Arch via yay # Using an Arch based distro(Arch,CachyOS,EndevourOS, I know you know you’re on Arch)
(not Steam Deck check PGR discord or Steam Deck/Univseral Guide that will covered soon if not already)
This package is installed form Arch User Rep
https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/bbe
sudo pacman -S yay yay -S bbe Install bbe on Fedora via COPR # Using a Fedora based distro (Fedora,Nobara,ect)
Will be using this copr package to install BBE
https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/adrianl40/bbe/
Enable the COPR repo:
sudo dnf copr enable adrianl40/bbe sudo dnf install bbe Confirmed BBE is installed # After installed confirm with:
bbe --version Fixing the Launcher to not be Transparentafter installed with Windows Runner # Open a terminal inside that directory (should be the version directory where the name is a version number) Paste this command in:
mv launcher_main.dll launcher_main.dll.bak bbe -e "s/\x12AllowsTransparency/\x09IsEnabled\x1bA\x00\x03AAAAA/" launcher_main.dll.bak > launcher_main.dll This is a the same as the command above just split up. You have to add the path of the launcher_maill.dll yourself.
mv "/path/to/Punishing Gray Raven/#.#.#.#/launcher_main.dll" "/path/to/Punishing Gray Raven/#.#.#.#/launcher_main.dll.bak" bbe -e "s/\x12AllowsTransparency/\x09IsEnabled\x1bA\x00\x03AAAAA/" "/path/to/Punishing Gray Raven/#.#.#.#/launcher_main.dll.bak" > "/path/to/Punishing Gray Raven/#.#.#.#/launcher_main.dll" This does not alter the game in any way! It simply disables Transparency inside the launcher to allow the launcher to render.
